title: 1.12.2生物属性修改

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
574833857 发表于 2020-3-11 14:52
要加引号就可以了？
修改的是上限，你还要设置 Health 才能是 100

summon minecraft:zombie ~ ~ ~ {Health:100,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:100}]}

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
summon minecraft:zombie ~ ~ ~ {Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:100}]}

而且修改的是生命上限。

xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-11 14:51
summon minecraft:zombie ~ ~ ~ {Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:100}]}

而且修改的是生命上 ...
要加引号就可以了？
